snippet: NBC’s new quiz show, starting on Monday, is getting attention for its unspoken ambition: proving that broadcast TV still matters.
abstract: NBC’s The Million Second Quiz is a new quiz show that will run live for 10 days, with episodes broadcast every night and online allowing viewers to play along at home with an app; groundbreaking competition is getting attention for its unspoken ambition: proving that broadcast TV still matters.
lead_paragraph: NBC’s new quiz show, starting on Monday, is getting attention for its unspoken ambition: proving that broadcast TV still matters.

headline.main: If ‘Million Second Quiz’ Succeeds, NBC Gets the Grand Prize
headline.print_headline: If a Quiz Show Succeeds, NBC Gets the Grand Prize
